Event.name: Hit_target
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> causes the ballistic motion of a projectile and its subsequent impact on a <fen>Target</fen>.
<ex>It looks like <fex name="Agent">he</fex> <t>hit</t> <fex name="Target">the bull's-eye</fex> <fex name="ins">with his first arrow</fex>!</ex>
<ex>If <fex name="Agent">he</fex> <t>shot</t> <fex name="Target">her</fex>, he is fully culpable whether he meant to or not.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Target
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity which is hit by a Projectile directed by the Agent.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that directs the Projectile such that it impacts the Target.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to bring about by hitting the <fen>Target</fen></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> hits the <fen>Target</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Subregion
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The part of the <fen>Target</fen> hit by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>He <t>shot</t> me <fex name="Subregion">in the arm</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes hitting the <fen>Target</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity, most often ammunition or a firearm, which the <fen>Agent</fen> manipulates to hit the <fen>Target</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

lexUnit.name: shoot.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to fire a gun such that another object is impacted by a bullet.
